basic_info.description: I am Prakhar Tripathi.I am full stack web developer.I am a great team player,with specialization in MERN stack, also possess a strong will to learn about leadership and business.I am passionate about learning new things and look forward working in your company.

projects.title: Netmeds
projects.description: Netmeds is online portal for medicine where one can upload prescription order medicine and get them delivered at doorstep.

projects.title: Covid-Tracker
projects.description: This app creates a database of covid users for official purposes. It also shows the spread of covid in different states according to the database. Also, it recommends getting a checkup by a doctor if has more than 4 symptoms.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
